GSP33brsvbh3u:5: smṛtinyāyaśrutivirodhaparihāreṇa hi anadhyavasāyalakṣaṇamaprāmāṇyaṃ parihṛtaṃ tathāca prāmāṇye niścalīkṛte tārtīyo vicāro bhavatyanyathā tu nirbījatayā na sidhyediti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:6: avāntarasaṃgatiṃ darśayituntatra ca jīvavyatiriktāni tattvāni jīvopakaraṇānicetyuktam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:13: naca śrūyate tasmānna bhūtapariṣvakto raṃhatyapi tu karaṇamātrapariṣvaktaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:15: naca dehāntarārambhānyathānupapattyā bhūtapariṣvaktasya raṃhaṇakalpaneti yuktamityāha-sulabhāśca sarvatra bhūtamātrā iti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:19_1: kartrādikārakabhāvite cāntarikṣaṃ krameṇotkrāmya dyulokaṃ praviśantyau sūkṣmabhūte
GSP33brsvbh3u:23: yathāgnihotrādhikaraṇamāhavanīya evaṃ śraddhāśabdavācyāgnihotrāhutipariṇāmāvasthārūpāḥ sūkṣmā yā āpaḥ śraddhābhāvitāstadadhikaraṇaṃ dyulokaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:25: tena hīddho 'sau dyuloko dīpyate 'taḥ samindhanātsamit tasyādityasya raśmayo dhūmā indhanādivādityādraśmīnāṃ samutthānāt /
GSP33brsvbh3u:33: parjanyo vāva gautamāgniḥ parjanyo nāma vṛṣṭyupakaraṇābhimānī devatāviśeṣaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:43: tasmindevā yajamānaprāṇā agnirūpāḥ somaṃ rājānaṃ juhvati tasya somasyāhutervarṣaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh3u:44: etaduktaṃ bhavati-śraddhākhyā āpo dyulokamāhutitvena praviśya candrākāreṇa pariṇatāḥ satyo dvitīye paryāye parjanyāgnau hutā vṛṣṭitvena pariṇamanta iti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:45: 'pṛthivī vāva gautamāgniḥ'tasya pṛthivyākhyasyāgnaiḥ saṃvatsara eva samit /
GSP33brsvbh3u:46: saṃvatsareṇa kālena hi samiddhā bhūmirvrīhyādiniṣpattaye kalpate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:48: rātrirarciḥ pṛthivyā śyāmāyā anurūpā śyāmatayā rātriragnerivānurupamarciḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:49: diśoṅgārāḥ prage rātrirūpārciḥśamane upaśāntānāṃ prasannānāṃ diśāṃ darśanāt /
GSP33brsvbh3u:51: tasminnagnau śraddhāsomapariṇāmakrameṇāgatā apo vṛṣṭirūpeṇa pariṇatā devā juhvati tasyā āhuterannaṃ vrīhiyavādi bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh3u:53: vācā khalvayaṃ tālvādyaṣṭasthānasthitayā varṇapadavākyābhivyaktikrameṇārthajātaṃ prakāśayan samidhyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:59: tā evāpaḥ śraddhādipariṇāmakrameṇāgatāḥ vrīhyādirūpeḥ pariṇatā satyaḥ puruṣe 'gnau hutāstāsāṃ pariṇāmo retaḥ saṃbhavati /
GSP33brsvbh3u:60: yoṣā vāva gautamāgniḥ tasyā upastha eva samit /
GSP33brsvbh3u:61: tena hi sā putrādyutpādanāya samidhyate yadupamantrayate sa dhūmaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:62: strīsaṃbhavādupamantraṇasya lomāni vā dhūmaḥ yonirarciḥ lohitatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh3u:66: tasminnetasminnagnau devā reto juhvati tasyā āhutergarbhaḥ saṃbhavati /
GSP33brsvbh3u:67: evaṃ śraddhāsomavarṣānnaretohavanakrameṇa yoṣāgniṃ prāpyāpo garbhākhyā bhavanti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:69: yataḥ pañcamyāmāhutāvāpaḥ puruṣavacaso bhavanti tasmādadbhiḥ pariveṣṭito jīvo rahatīti gamyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:70: etaduktaṃ bhavati-śraddhāśabdavācyā āpa ityagre vakṣyati tāsāṃ trivṛtkatatayā tejo 'nnāvinābhāvenābgrahaṇena tejonnayorapi saṃgraha ityetadapi vakṣyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:71: yadyapyetāvatāpi bhūtaveṣṭitasya jīvasya raṃhaṇaṃ nāvagamyate tejovannānāṃ pañcamyāmāhutau puruṣavacastvamātraśravaṇāt,
GSP33brsvbh3u:72_1: somo rāṭ'iti śrutyā saha 'śraddhāṃ juhvati tasyā āhuteḥ somo rājā saṃbhavati'ityasyāḥ
GSP33brsvbh3u:73: tathāhi-yā evāpo hutā dvitīyasyāmāhutau somabhāvaṃ gatāstābhireṣa pariṣvakto jīva iṣṭādikārī candrabhūyaṃ gataścandralokaṃ prāpta iti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:74: nanu svatantrā āpaḥ śraddhādikrameṇa somabhāvamāpnuvantu tābhirapariṣvakta eva tu jīvaḥ sendriyamātro gatvā somabhāvamanubhavatu /
GSP33brsvbh3u:78: evaṃ hi śrutisāmānyaṃ kalpeta yadi yena rūpeṇa yena ca krameṇāpāṃ somabhāvastenaiva jīvasyāpi somabhāvo bhavet /
GSP33brsvbh3u:81_0: ato dadhipayaḥprabhṛtayo dravabhūyastvādāpo hutāḥ sūkṣmībhūtā iṣṭādikāriṇamāśritā
GSP33brsvbh3u:81_1: nendhanena vidhinā dehe hūyamāne hutāḥ satya āhutimayya iṣṭādikāriṇaṃ pariveṣṭya
GSP33brsvbh3u:83: ayamarthaḥ-evaṃ hi sūkṣmadehapariṣvakto raṃhet yadyasya sthūlaṃ śarīraṃ raṃhato na bhavet /
GSP33brsvbh3u:91: tasya ca dehendriyāderupādheḥ prādeśikatvānna tatra san dehāntaraṃ gantumarhati /
GSP33brsvbh3u:92: tasmātsūkṣmadehapariṣvakto raṃhatikarmopasthāpitaḥ pratipattavyaḥ prāptavyo yo dehastadviṣayāyā bhāvanāyā utpādanāyā dīrghībhāvamātraṃ jalūkayopamīyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:96: ālayavijñānasaṃtāna ātmā tasya vṛttiḥ ṣaṭ pravṛttivijñānāni /
GSP33brsvbh3u:102: te hi śarīrātmavādino bhasmībhāvamātmana āhurna kasyacidgamanamiti //1//
GSP33brsvbh3u:112: yastu gandhasvedapākaprāṇāvakāśadānadarśanāddehasya pāñcabhautikatvaṃ paśyaṃstejobannātmakatvena tryātmakatve na parituṣyati,
GSP33brsvbh3u:115: ato na sa deho bhūtāntarāṇi pratyākhyāya kevalābhiradbhirārabdhuṃ śakyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:121: prāṇānāṃ jīvaddehe sāśrayatvamavagataṃ gacchati jīvaddehe tadanuvidhāyinaḥ prāṇā api gacchantīti dṛṣṭam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:123: sa caiṣāmanuvidheyaḥ sūkṣmo deho bhūtendriyamaya iti gamyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:128: śrāvite 'pi spaṣṭe jīvasya prāṇaiḥ saha gamane 'gnyādigatiśaṅkā śrutivirodhotthāpanārthā /
GSP33brsvbh3u:134: prathame 'śravaṇāditi cenna tā eva hyupapatteḥ / BBs_3,1.5 /
GSP33brsvbh3u:135: pañcamyāmāhutāvapāṃ puruṣavacastvaprakāre pṛṣṭe prathamāyāmāhutau anapāṃ śraddhāyā hotavyatābhidhānasaṃbhaddhamanupapannaṃ ca /
GSP33brsvbh3u:136: nahi yathā paśvādibhyo hṛdayādayo 'vayavā avadāya niṣkṛṣya hūyante,
GSP33brsvbh3u:137: evaṃ śraddhā buddhiprasādalakṣaṇā niṣkraṣṭuṃ vā hotuṃ vā śakyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:146: teṣāṃ yaḥ samāhāraḥ ṣaṇṇāṃ sā ṣaṭpraśnī,
GSP33brsvbh3u:152: kriyāsamabhihāreṇāpyāyanāpakṣayau yathā somasya tathā bhakṣayanti somamayāṃllokānityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:155_2: bhoktṛṇāmeva satāṃ devopajīvitāmātreṇa bhākto gamayitavyo na tu carvaṇanigaraṇābhyāṃ mukhya iti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:158: yathā hi balīvardādayo bhuñjānā api svaphalaṃ svāmino halādivahanenopakurvāṇā bhogyāḥ,
GSP33brsvbh3u:159: evaṃ paramatattvamavidvāṃsa iṣṭādikāriṇa iha dadhipayaḥpuroḍāśādināmuṣmiṃśca loke paricārakatayā devānāmupabhogyā iti śrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:162: yo hi pañcāgnividyāṃ na veda taṃ devā bhakṣayantīti nindyate pañcāgnividyāṃ stotuṃ tasyā eva prakṛtatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh3u:174: ca yatkiñceha karma kṛtaṃ tasyāntaṃ prāpyeti śravaṇāt,
GSP33brsvbh3u:182: tathāca ramaṇīyacaraṇāḥ kapūyacaraṇā ityācārameva yoninimittamupadiśati na tu karma /
GSP33brsvbh3u:183_0: stāṃ vā karmaśīle dve apyaviśeṣeṇānuśayastathāpi yadyapyayamiṣṭāpūrtakārī svayaṃ
GSP33brsvbh3u:184: smaryate hyanyasya sukṛtaduṣkṛtābhyāmanyasya tatsaṃbandhinastatphalabhāgitā-'patatyardhaśarīreṇa yasya bhāryā surāṃ pibet'ityādi /
GSP33brsvbh3u:186: tasmādyāvatsaṃpātamityupakramānurodhāt 'yat kiñceha karoti'iti ca śrutyantarānusārādramaṇīyacaraṇatvaṃ saṃbandhyantaragatamiṣṭāpūrtakāriṇi bhāktaṃ gamayitavyam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:187: tathāca niranuśayānāmeva bhuktabhogānāmavaroha iti prāpta ucyate-yena karmakalāpena phalamupabhojitaṃ tasminnatīte 'pi sānuśayā eva candramaṇḍalādavarohanti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:196: nahi 'yāvajjīvamagnihotraṃ juhuyāt'iti yāvajjīvamāhāravihārādisamaye 'pi homaṃ vidhatte nāpi madhyāhnādāvapi tu sāyaṃprātaḥkālāpekṣayā /
GSP33brsvbh3u:204: nahi yāvantaḥ saṃpātā yāvatāṃ vā puṃsāṃ saṃpātāste sarve tatreṣṭādikāriṇā bhogena kṣayaṃ nīyante /
GSP33brsvbh3u:209: api ceṣṭāpūrtakārīha janmani kevalaṃ na tanmātramakārṣīdapi tu godohanenāpaḥ praṇayan paśuphalamapyapūrvaṃ samacaiṣīt /
GSP33brsvbh3u:210: evamaharniśaṃ ca vāṅmanaḥ śarīraceṣṭābhiḥ puṇyāpuṇyamihāmutropabhogyaṃ saṃcitavato na martyalokādibhogyaṃ candraloke bhogyaṃ bhavitumarhati /
GSP33brsvbh3u:211: naca svaphalavirodhino 'nuśayasya ṛte prāyaścittādātmajñānādvādattaphalasya dhvaṃsaḥ saṃbhavati /
GSP33brsvbh3u:214: anye tu sakalakarmakṣaye parāvṛttiśaṅkā nirbījeti manyamānā anyathādhikaraṇaṃ varṇayāñcakrurityāha-kecittāvadāhuriti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:216: tatredamiha vicāryate-kiṃ dattaphalānāmiṣṭāpūrtakarmaṇāmavaśeṣādihāvartante uta tānyupabhogena niravaśeṣaṃ kṣapayitvānupabhuktakarmaśādihāvartanta iti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:217: tatreṣṭādīnāṃ bhogena samūlakāṣaṃ kaṣitatvānniranuśayā evānupabhuktakarmavaśādāvartanta iti prāpta ucyate-sānuśayā evāvartanta iti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:219: yathā bhāṇḍasthe madhuni sarpiṣi vā kṣālite 'pi bhāṇḍalepakaṃ taccheṣaṃ madhu vā sarpirvā na kṣālayituṃ śakyamiti dṛṣṭamevaṃ tadanusārādetadapi pratipattavyam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:221_0: yathā sevako hāstikāśvīyapadātivrātaparivṛto mahārājaṃ sevamānaḥ kālavaśācchatrapādukāvaśeṣo
GSP33brsvbh3u:221_1: na sevitumarhatīti dṛṣṭaṃ tanmūlā ca laukikī smṛtiriti dṛṣṭasmṛtibhyāṃ sānuśayā evāvartanta iti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:230: iha janmani hi paryāyeṇa sukhaduḥkhe bhujyamāne dṛśyete /
GSP33brsvbh3u:235: na cābhivyaktaṃ ca karma phalaṃ na datta iti ca saṃbhavati /
GSP33brsvbh3u:237_2: phalopabhogena prakṣayānnāsti teṣāṃ karmāśya iti na te saṃsareyuḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:245: anena niranuśayā evāvarohantīti pūrvapakṣabījaṃ nigūḍhamuddhāṭya nirasyati /
GSP33brsvbh3u:253: 'ācārahīnaṃ na punanti vedāḥ'iti hi smṛtyā vedapadena vedārthamupalakṣayantyā vedārthānuṣṭhānaśeṣatvamācārasyoktaṃ na tu svatantra ācāraḥ phalasya sādhanaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh3u:267: 'ye vai ke cāsmāllokātprayanti candramasameva te sarve gacchanti'iti kauṣītakināṃ samāmnānāt,
GSP33brsvbh3u:269: tathāhi-dyusomavṛṣṭyannaretaḥpariṇāmakrameṇa tā evāpo yoṣidagnau hutāḥ puruṣavacaso bhavantītyaviśeṣeṇa śrutam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:274: 'jāyasva mriyasveti tṛtīyaṃ sthānam'iti ca sthānatvamātreṇāvagamātpathitvenāpratīteścandralokādavatīrṇānāmapi ca tatsthānatvasaṃbhavādasaṃpūraṇena prativacanopapatteḥ,
GSP33brsvbh3u:275: ananyamārgatayā ca tadbhogavirahiṇāmapi grāmaṃ gacchan vṛkṣamūlānyupasarpatītivatsaṃyamanādiṣu yamavaśyatāyai candralokagamanopapatteḥ,
GSP33brsvbh3u:277_1: na mārgatvaṃ tathāpi vettha yathāsau mārgo na saṃpūryate ityasya prativacanāvasare
GSP33brsvbh3u:278: yadi punastenaiva mārgeṇāgatya janmamaraṇaprabandhavat sthānamadhyāsīta naitattṛtīyaṃ sthānaṃ bhavet /
GSP33brsvbh3u:279: nahīṣṭādikāriṇaścandramaṇḍalādavaruhya ramaṇīyāṃ ninditāṃ vā yoniṃ pratipadyamānāstṛtīyaṃ sthānaṃ pratipadyante /
GSP33brsvbh3u:284: tato 'vagacchāmaḥ saṃyamanaṃ sapta ca yātanābhūmīryamavaśatayā pratipadyamānā aniṣṭādikāriṇo na candramaṇḍalādavarohantīti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:285: tasmāt 'ye vai ke ca'itīṣṭādikāriviṣayaṃ na sarvaviṣayam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:295: saṃyamane tv anubhūyetareṣāmārohāv arohau tadgatidarśanāt / BBs_3,1.13 / // 13 //
GSP33brsvbh3u:332: yadyapi yathetamākāśamākāśādvāyumityato na tādātmyaṃ sphuṭamavagamyate tathāpi vāyurbhūtvetyādeḥ sphuṭataraṃ tādātmyāvagamādyathetamākāśamityetadapi tādātmya evāvatiṣṭhate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:334: manuṣyaśarīrasya nandikeśvarasya devadeharūpapariṇāmasmaraṇāddevadehasya ca nahuṣasya tiryaktvasmaraṇāt /
GSP33brsvbh3u:336: gauṇyāṃ ca vṛttau lakṣaṇāśabdaḥ prayukto guṇe lakṣaṇāyāḥ saṃbhavāt /
GSP33brsvbh3u:339: samāno bhāvo rūpaṃ yeṣāṃ te sabhāvāsteṣāṃ bhāvaḥ sābhāvyaṃ sārūpyaṃ sādṛśyamiti yāvat /
GSP33brsvbh3u:344: yadi tu devājagaśarīre samasamaye syātāṃ na devaśarīramajagaraśarīraṃ śilpiśatenāpi kriyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:345: nahi dadhipayasī samasamaye parasparātmanī śakye saṃpādayituṃ,
GSP33brsvbh3u:349: nanvākāśabhāvena saṃyogamātraṃ lakṣyatāṃ kiṃ sādṛśyenetyata āha-vibhutvāccākāśeneti //22//
GSP33brsvbh3u:353: 'durniṣprapataram'iti duḥkhena niḥsaraṇaṃ brūte na tu vilambeneti manyate pūrvapakṣī /
GSP33brsvbh3u:354: vinā sthūlaśarīraṃ na sūkṣmaśarīre duḥkhabhāgīti durniṣprapataraṃ vilambaṃ lakṣayatīti rāddhāntaḥ //23//
GSP33brsvbh3u:358: ākāśasārūpyaṃ vāyudhūmādisaṃparko 'nuśayināmukta ihedānīṃ vrīhiyavā oṣādhivanaspatayastilabhāṣā iti jāyanta iti śrūyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:359: tatra saṃśayaḥ-kimanuśayināṃ bhogādhiṣṭhānaṃ vrīhiyavādayaḥ sthāvarā bhavanti,
GSP33brsvbh3u:361: tatra manuṣyo jāyate devo jāyata ityādau prayoge janeḥ śarīraparigrahe prasiddhatvādatrāpi vrīhyādiśarīraparigraha eva janirmukhyārtha iti vrīhyādiśarīrā evānuśayina iti yuktam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:362: naca ramaṇīyacaraṇāḥ kapūyacaraṇā itivat karmaviśeṣāsaṃkīrtanāmāttadabhāve vrīhyādīnāṃ śarīrabhāvābhāvātkṣetrajñānantarādhiṣṭhitānāmeva yatsaṃparkamātramiti sāṃpratam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:365: sāmānyaśāstrasya hiṃsāmānyadvāreṇa viśeṣopasarpaṇaṃ vilambeneti sākṣādviśeṣaspṛśaḥ śāstracchīghratarapravṛttāddurbalatvāditi sāṃpratam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:366: nahi balavadityeva durbalaṃ bādhate kintu sati virodhe /
GSP33brsvbh3u:369: 'agnīṣomīyaṃ paśumālabhet 'iti hi kratuprakaraṇe samāmnātaṃ kratvarthatāmasya gamayati na tvapanayati niṣedhāpāditāmasya puruṣaṃ pratyanarthahetutām /
GSP33brsvbh3u:370: tenāstu niṣedhādasya puruṣaṃ pratyanarthahetutā vidheścha kratvarthatā ko virodhaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:373_1: yadi ramaṇīyacaraṇāḥ kapūyacaraṇā itivadvrīhyādiṣvanuśayavatāṃ karmaviśeṣaḥ kīrtyeta na caitadasti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:376: naca tadgatāyāḥ paśuhiṃsāyā 'na hiṃsyāt'iti niṣedhātkratvarthāyā api duḥkhaphalavatsaṃbhavaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:378: tathāhi-na hiṃsyāditi niṣedhasya niṣedhyādhīnanirūpaṇatayā yadarthaṃ niṣedhyaṃ tadartha eva niṣedho vijñāyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:379: na caitat 'nānṛtaṃ vadet' 'na tau paśau karoti'itivatkasyacitprakaraṇe samāmnātaṃ yenānṛtatavadanavadasya niṣedhasya kratvarthate niṣedho 'pi kratvarthaḥ syāt /
GSP33brsvbh3u:380: paśau niṣiddhayorājyabhāgayoḥ kratvarthatvena niṣedhasyāpi kratvarthatvaṃ bhavet /
GSP33brsvbh3u:384: kevalaṃ tasya rāgataḥ prāptatvāttadanuvādena nañarthaṃ vidhirupasaṃkrāmati,
GSP33brsvbh3u:385: tena puruṣārtho niṣedhya iti tadadhīnanirūpaṇo niṣedho 'pi puruṣārtho bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh3u:386: tathā cāyamarthaḥ saṃpadyate-yatpuruṣārthaṃ hananaṃ tanna kuryāditi /
GSP33brsvbh3u:387: kratvarthasyāpi ca niṣedhe hiṃsāyāḥ kratūpakārakatvamapi kalpyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:388: naca dṛṣṭe puruṣokārakatve pratyarthini sati tatkalpanāspadam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:389: naca svātantryapāratantrye sati saṃyogapṛthaktve khādiratādivadekatra saṃbhavataḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:395: vrīhyādibhāvamāpannāḥ khalvanuśayinaḥ puruṣairupabhuktā retaḥ sigbhāvamanubhavantī śrūyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:397_0: vrīhyādidehatve hi vrīhyādiṣu lūneṣvavahantinā phalīkṛteṣu ca vrīhyādidehavināśādanuśayinaḥ
GSP33brsvbh3u:397_1: pravaseyuriti kathamanuśayināṃ retaḥsigbhāvaḥ saṃsargamātre tu saṃsargiṣu vrīhyādiṣu
GSP33brsvbh3u:397_2: naṣṭeṣvapi na saṃsargiṇo 'nuśayinaḥ pravaseyuriti retaḥsigbhāva upapadyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:401: aśuddham iti cen na śabdāt / BBs_3,1.25 / // 25 //
GSP33brsvbh3u:406: sadyo jāto hi bālo na retaḥ sigbhavatyapi tu cirajātaḥ prauḍhayauvanaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh3u:410: tatkimidānīṃ sarvatraivānuśayināṃ saṃsargamātraṃ tathāca ramaṇīyacaraṇā ityādiṣu tathābhāva āpadyeteti netyāha-
GSP33brsvbh3u:413: iti śrīvācaspatimiśraviracite śārīrakamīmāṃsābhāṣyavibhāge bhāmatyāṃ tṛtīyasyādhyāyasya prathamaḥ pādaḥ //
GSP33brsvbh3u:414: // iti tṛtīyādhyāyasya gatyāgaticintayā vairāgyanirūpaṇākhyaḥ prathamaḥ pādaḥ // ____________________________________________________________________________________________
GSP33brsvbh3u:421: idānīṃ tu tasyaiva jīvasyāvasthābhedaḥ svayañjyotiṣṭvasiddhyartha prapañcayate-kiṃ prabodha iva svapne 'pi pāramārthikī sṛṣṭirāhosvinmāyāmayīti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:422: yadyapi brahmaṇo 'nyasyānirvācyatayā jāgratsvapnāvasthāgatayorubhayorapi sargayormāyamayatvaṃ tathāpi yathā jāgratsṛṣṭirbrahmātmabhāvasākṣātkārātprāganuvartate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:424: evaṃ kiṃ svapnasṛṣṭirāhosvit pratidinameva nivartata iti vimarśārthaḥ //
GSP33brsvbh3u:430: ayamabhisaṃdhiḥ-iha hi sarvāṇyeva mithyājñānānyudāharaṇaṃ teṣāṃ satyatvaṃ pratijñāyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:434: atathātvasya tvapratīyamānasya tathābhāvaprameyavirodhena kalpanāspadatvāt bādhakapratyayādatathātvamiti cet / na /
GSP33brsvbh3u:441: yathāhi kṣīraṃ dṛṣṭaṃ kālāntare dadhi bhavati,
GSP33brsvbh3u:444: yadyasya tīvrātapaklāntisahitaṃ cakṣuḥ sa tasya rajatarūpatāṃ gṛhṇāti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:447: evamutpalamapi nīlalohitaṃ divā saurībhirbhābhirabhivyaktaṃ nīlatayā gṛhyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:449: evamasatyāṃ nidrāyāṃ sato 'pi rathādīnna gṛhṇāti nidrāṇastu gṛhṇātīti sāmagrībhedādvā kālabhedādvā virodhābhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:458: imamarthaṃ śrutirapi darśayati-'atha rathān rathayogān pathaḥ sṛjate'iti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:459: naca 'na tatra rathā na rathayogā na panthāno bhavanti'iti virodhādupacaritārthāṃ sṛjata iti śrutirvyākhyeyā /
GSP33brsvbh3u:460: sṛjata iti hi śruterbahuśrutisaṃvādātpramāṇāntarasaṃvādācca balīyastvena tadanuguṇatayā na tatra rathā ityasyā bhāktatvena vyākhyānāt /
GSP33brsvbh3u:461: jāgradavasthādarśanayogyā na santi na tu rathā na santīti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:468: tadyathā svapne śuklāmbaradharaḥ śuklamālyānulepano brāhmaṇāyanaḥ priyavrataṃ pratyāha-priyavrata,
GSP33brsvbh3u:470: sa ca jāgrattathātmano mānamanubhūya svapnapratyayaṃ satyamabhimanyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:481: na tāvat kṣīrasyeva dadhi rajatasya pariṇāmaḥ śuktiḥ saṃbhavati /
GSP33brsvbh3u:482: nahi jātvīśvaragṛhe cirasthitānyapi rajatabhājanāni śuktibhāvamanubhavanti dṛśyante /
GSP33brsvbh3u:483: na cetarasya rajatānubhavasamaye 'nyo 'nākulendriyo na tasya śuktibhāvamanubhavati pratyeti ca /
GSP33brsvbh3u:486: pāramārthike hyāsya toyabhāve tatsādhyāmudānyopaśamalakṣaṇārthakriyāṃ kuryānmarīcisādhyāmapi rūpaprakāśalakṣaṇām /
GSP33brsvbh3u:489: tadarthakriyākāritvavyāptaṃ toyatvaṃ mātrayāpi tāmakurvattoyameva na syāt /
GSP33brsvbh3u:490: apica toyapratyayasamīcīnatvāyāsya dvaividhyamabhyupeyate taccābhyupagame 'pi na seddhumarhati /
GSP33brsvbh3u:491: tathāhi-asamarthavidhāpāti toyametaditi manvāno na tṛṣṇayāpi marīcitoyamabhidhāvet yathā marīcīnanubhavan /
GSP33brsvbh3u:493: kimaparāddhaṃ marīciṣu toyaviparyāsena sarvajanīnena yattamatilaṅghya viparyāsāntaraṃ kalpyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:495: tatrāpi rajatajñānaṃ pūrvamutpannaṃ bādhyamuttaraṃ tu bādhakaṃ śuktijñānaṃ prāptipūrvakatvātpratiṣedhasya /
GSP33brsvbh3u:496: rajatajñānātprākprāpakābhāvena śukteraprāptāyāḥ pratiṣedhasaṃbhavātpūrvajñānaprāptaṃ tu rajataṃ śuktijñānamapabādhitumarhati /
GSP33brsvbh3u:500: naca vartamānarajatāvabhāsi jñānaṃ bhaviṣyattāmasyāgocarayanna bhaviṣyatā svasamayavartinīṃ śuktiṃ gocarayatā pratyayena bādhyate,
GSP33brsvbh3u:502: mā nāmāsya jñāsītpratyakṣaṃ bhaviṣyattāṃ tatpṛṣṭhabhāvi tvanumānamupakārabhāvahetumivāsati vināśapratyayopanipāte sthemānamākalayati /
GSP33brsvbh3u:504: tathāca rajatagocaraṃ pratyakṣaṃ vastutaḥ sthirameva rajataṃ gocarayet /
GSP33brsvbh3u:512: yadi cirasthāyitvaṃ yogyatā na sā pratyakṣagocaraḥ śakteratīndriyatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh3u:517: tasmādatyantābhyāsavaśena pratyakṣānantaraṃ śīghratarotpannavinaśyadavasthānumānasahitapratyakṣābhiprāyameva cirasthāyīti gṛhyata iti mantavyam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:523: yattu satyaṃ svapnadarśanamuktaṃ tatrāpyākhyātrā brāhmaṇāyanenākhyāte saṃvādābhāvāt /
GSP33brsvbh3u:528: rajanīsamaye 'pi hi bhāratādvarṣāntare ketumālādau vāsaro bhavatīti bhārate varṣa ityuktam //3//
GSP33brsvbh3u:531: sūcakaśca hi śruterācakṣate ca tadvidaḥ / BBs_3,2.4 /
GSP33brsvbh3u:537: prājñavyāpāratvena pāramārthikatvānumānaṃ pratyakṣeṇa bādhakapratyayena virudhyamānaṃ nātmānaṃ labhata iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:541: parābhidhyānāt tu tirohitaṃ tato hyasya bandhaviparyayau / BBs_3,2.5 /
GSP33brsvbh3u:551: iha hi nāḍīpuritatparamātmāno jīvasya suṣuptāvasthāyāṃ sthānatvena śrūyante /
GSP33brsvbh3u:555: yadā nāḍyo vā purītadvā suṣuptasthānaṃ tadā viparītagrahaṇanivṛttāvapi na jīvasya paramātmabhāva iti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:556: avidyānivṛttāvapi jīvasya paramātmabhāvāya kāraṇāntaramapekṣitavyaṃ tacca karmaiva na tu tattajñānaṃ viparītajñānanivṛttimātreṇa tasyopayogāt,
GSP33brsvbh3u:560: ata tu paramātmaiva nāḍīpurītasmṛtidvārā suṣuptisthānaṃ tato viparītajñānanivṛtterasti mātrayā paramātmabhāva upayogaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:561: tayā hi tāvadeṣa jīvastadavasthāno bhavati kevalam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:562: tattvajñānābhāvena samūlakāṣamavidyāyā akāṣājjāgratsvapnalakṣaṇaṃ jīvasya vyutthānaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh3u:565: nāḍīpurītatparamātmasu sthāneṣu suṣuptasya jīvasya nilayaṃ prati vikalpaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:566: yathā bahuṣu prāsādeṣveko narendraḥ kadācitkvacinnilīyate kadācitkvacidevameko jīvaḥ kadācinnāḍīṣu kadācitpurītati kadācidbrahmaṇīti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:567: yathā nirapekṣā vrīhiyavāḥ kratusādhanībhūtapuroḍāśaprakṛtitayā śrutā ekārthā vikalpyante,
GSP33brsvbh3u:568: evaṃ saptamīśrutyā vāyatanaśrutyā vekanilayanārthāḥ parasparānapekṣā nāḍyadayo 'pi vikalpamarhanti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:569: yatrāpi nāḍībhiḥ pratyavasṛpya purītati śeta iti nāḍīpurītatoḥ samuccayaśravaṇam 'tathā tāsu tadā bhavati yadā suptaḥ svapnaṃ na kañcana paśyati /
GSP33brsvbh3u:570: athāsmin prāṇa evaikadhā bhavati'iti nāḍībrahmaṇorādhārayoḥ samuccayaśravaṇam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:571: prāṇaśabdaṃ ca brahma 'athāsmin prāṇe brahmaṇi sa jīva ekadhā bhavati'nnirapekṣayoravedhāratvam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:574: evaṃ tābhireva saṃcaramāṇasya kadācidbrahmaivādhāra iti siddhamādhāratve nāḍīpurītatparamātmanāmanapekṣatvam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:576: prāpte 'bhidhīyate-jīvaḥ samuccayenaivaitāni nāḍyādīni svāpāyopaiti na vikalpena /
GSP33brsvbh3u:580: prakṛtakratusādhanībhūtapuroḍāśadravyaprakṛtitayā hi parasparānapekṣau vrīhiyavau vihitauśakrutaścaitau pratyekaṃ puroḍāśamabhinirvartayitum /
GSP33brsvbh3u:581: tatra yadi miśrābhyāṃ puroḍāśo 'bhinirvartyeta parasparānapekṣavrīhiyavavidhātṛṇī ubhe api śāstre bādhyeyātām /
GSP33brsvbh3u:583: sa hi yathā vihitānyaṅgānyabhisamīkṣya pravartamāno naitānyanyathayitaṃ śaknoti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:587: na cāṅgabhūtaindravāyavādigrahānurodhena yathā pradhānasya somayāgasyāvṛttirevamatrāpīti yuktam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:590: 'somamabhiplāvayati'iti ca vākyāntarānulocanayā rasadvāreṇa yāgasādhanībhūtasyendravāyvādyuddeśena prādeśamātreṣūrdhvapātreṣu grahaṇāni pṛthakprakalpanāni saṃskārā vidhīyante,
GSP33brsvbh3u:595: naca yāvanmātramekamūrdhvapātraṃ vyāpnoti tāvanmātraṃ gṛhītvā pariśiṣṭaṃ tyajyeteti yujyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:597: evaṃ taddṛṣṭārthaṃ bhavedyadi tatsarvaṃ yāga upayujyeta /
GSP33brsvbh3u:599_0: tasmātsakalasya somarasasya yāgaśeṣatvena saṃskārārhatvādekaikena ca grahaṇena sakalasya
GSP33brsvbh3u:600: ata eva samuccayadarśanaṃ 'daśautānadhvaryuḥ prātaḥ savane grahan gṛhṇāti'iti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:604: teṣāṃ ca samuccaye sati yāvadyaduddeśena gṛhītaṃ tāvattasyai devatāyai tyaktavyamityarthādyāgasyāvṛttyā bhavitavyam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:605: yadi punaḥ pṛthakkṛtānyapyekīkṛtya kāñcana devatāmuddiśya tyajeran,
GSP33brsvbh3u:614: sā coktā bhāṣyakṛtā-yatrāpi nirapekṣā iva nāḍīḥ suptisthānatvena śrāvayatītyādinā /
GSP33brsvbh3u:617: nanu yadi brahmaiva nilayanasthānaṃ tāvanmātramucyatāṃ kṛtaṃ nāḍyupanyāsenetyata āha-apicātreti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:622: pittenābhivyāptakaraṇo na bāhyānviṣayānvedeti taddvārā sukhaduḥkhābhāvena tatkāraṇapāpmāsparśena nāḍīstutiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:623: yadā tu tejo brahma tadā sugamam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:624: apica nāḍyaḥ purītadvā jīvasyopādhyādhāra eva bhavatīti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:627: tathāhi-nāḍyaḥ purītadvā jīvasyopādhīnāṃ karaṇānāmāśrayo jīvastu brāhmāvyatirekātsvamahipratiṣṭhaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:629: vikalpa tu vyatirekaṃ brahmaṇa ādhāratvamucyate jīvaṃ prati /
GSP33brsvbh3u:630: tathāca suṣuptāvasthāyāmupādhīnāmasamudācārājjīvasya brahmātmatvameva brahmādhāratvaṃ na tu nāḍīpurītādhāratvam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:631: tadupādhikaraṇamātrādhāratayā tu suṣuptadaśārambhāya jīvasya nāḍīpurītadādhāratvamityatulyārthatayā na vikalpa iti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:633: autsagikaṃ brahmasvarūpatvaṃ jīvasyāsati jāgratsvapnadaśārūpe 'pavāde suṣuptavasthāyāṃ nānyathayituṃ śakyamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:634: apica ye 'pi sthānavikalpamāsthiṣacata tairapi viśeṣavijñānopaśamalakṣaṇā suṣuptyavasthāṅgīkartavyā /
GSP33brsvbh3u:635: na ceyamātmatādātmyaṃ vinā nāḍyādiṣu paramātmavyatirikteṣu sthāneṣūpapadyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:636: tatra hi sthito 'yaṃ jīva ātmavyatirekābhimānī sannavaśyaṃ viśeṣajñānavān bhavet /
GSP33brsvbh3u:646: aupādhike tu paricchede yatropādhisaṃnihitastanmātraṃ na jānīyānna tu sarvam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:648: tasmātsarvaviśeṣavijñānapratyastamayīṃ suṣuptiṃ prasādayata tadāsya sarvopādhyupasaṃhāro vaktavyaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:650: guṇapradhānabhāvena samuccayo na samapradhānatayāgneyādivaditi vadanvikalpamapyapākaroti-naca vayamiheti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:652: naca suṣuptāvasthāyāṃ jīvasya svarūpeṇa nāḍyādisthānatvapratipādane kiñcitprayojanaṃ brahmabhūyapratipādane tvasti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:653: tasmānna samapradhānabhāvena samuccayo nāpi vikalpa iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:664: sa vānyo veti īśvaro veti saṃbhavamātreṇopanyāsaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:668: yaddhi dvyahādinirvartanīyamekasya puṃsaścoditaṃ karma tasya pūrvedyuranuṣṭhitasyāsti smṛtiriti vaktavye 'nuḥ pratyabhijñānasūcanārthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:672: jīvaḥ pratinyāyaṃ saṃprasāde suṣuptāvasthāyāṃ vṛddhāntāyādravati āgacchati pratiyoni /
GSP33brsvbh3u:673: yohi vyāghrayoniḥ suṣupto buddhāntamāgacchan sa vyāghra eva bhavati na jātyantaram /
GSP33brsvbh3u:674: tadidamuktam-ta iha vyāghro vā siṃho veti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:676: yo hi jīvaḥ suptaḥ sa śarīrāntara uttiṣṭhati śarīrāntaragatastu suptajīvasaṃbandhini śarīra uttiṣṭhati,
GSP33brsvbh3u:678: apica na jīvo nāma kaścitparasmādanya iti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:682: evamanādyanirvacanīyāvidyopadhānabhedopādhikalpito jīvo na vastutaḥ paramātmano bhidyate tadupādyudbhavābhibhavābhyāṃ codbhūta ityabhibhūta iva pratīyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:685: tasya cāvidyātadvāsanopādheranāditayā kāryakāraṇabhāvena pravahataḥ suvivecatayā tadupahito jīvaḥ suviveca iti //9//
GSP33brsvbh3u:692: tadyathā kaścitsuptotthitaḥ prāha sukhamahamasvāpsaṃ laghūni me gātrāṇi prasannaṃ me mana iti,
GSP33brsvbh3u:693: kaścitpunarduḥkhamasvāpsaṃ gurūṇi me gātrāṇi bhramatyanavasthitaṃ me mana iti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:698: yadyapi viśeṣavijñānopaśamena mohasuṣuptayoḥ sāmyaṃ tathāpi naikyam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:700: bāhyendriyavyāpārabhāvābhāvābhyāṃ tu bhede tayoḥ suṣuptamohayorapi prayojanabhedātkāraṇabhedāllakṣaṇabhedācca bhedaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:703: yadyapi satyapi mohe na maraṇaṃ tathāpyasati mohe na maraṇamiti maraṇārtho mohaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:705: tasmāt suṣuptamohāvasthayorbrahmaṇā saṃpattāvapi suṣupte yādṛśī saṃpattirna tādṛśī moha ityardhasaṃpattiruktā /
GSP33brsvbh3u:711: na sthānato 'pi parasyobhayaliṅgaṃ sarvatra hi / BBs_3,2.11 /
GSP33brsvbh3u:713_1: tathāpi prapañcaliṅgānāṃ bahvīnāṃ śrutīnāṃ darśanādbhavati punarvicikitsā atastannivāraṇāyārambhaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:720: tasmādubhayaliṅgakaśāstraprāmāṇyādubhayarūpatā brahmaṇaḥ pāramārthikīti prāpta ucyate-na sthānata upādhito 'pi parasya brahmaṇa ubhayacihnatvasaṃbhavaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:722: pāramārthikatve hyupādhijanitasya rūpasya brahmaṇaḥ pariṇāmo bhavet /
GSP33brsvbh3u:736: na bhedād iti cen na pratyekam atadvacanāt / BBs_3,2.12 / // 12 //
GSP33brsvbh3u:774: kiṃ sāllakṣaṇaṃ ca prakāśalakṣaṇaṃ ca brahma kiṃ sallakṣaṇameva brahmota prakāśalakṣaṇameveti tatra pūrvapakṣaṃ gṛhṇāti-prakāśavaccāvaiyarthyāt /
GSP33brsvbh3u:780: yathā sarvagandhatvādayo 'pi tu prakāśarūpameva saditi nobhayarūpatvaṃ brahmaṇa ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:783: bhede na sthānato 'pīti nirākṛtamiti nādhikaraṇāntaraṃ prayojayati /
GSP33brsvbh3u:785: sarveṣāṃ ca sādhāraṇe pravilayārthatve sati ' arūpavadeva hi tatpradhānatvāt' iti vinigamanakāraṇavacanamanavakāśaṃ syāt /
GSP33brsvbh3u:786: evaṃ hi tasyāvakāśaḥ syādyāda kāścidupāsanāparatayā rūpamācakṣīran kāścinnīrūpabrahmapratipādanaparā bhaveyuḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:792: vāstavasya vā prapañcasya pravilayaḥ sarpiṣa ivāgnisaṃyogāt /
GSP33brsvbh3u:794: na tāvadvāstavaḥ sarvasādhāraṇaḥ pṛthivyādiprapañcaḥ puruṣamātreṇa śakyaḥ samucchettum /
GSP33brsvbh3u:795: apica prahlādaśukādibhiḥ puruṣadhaureyaiḥ samūlamunmūlitaḥ prapañca iti śūnyaṃ jagadbhavet /
GSP33brsvbh3u:798: samāropitarūpastu prapañco brahmatattvajñāpanaparaireva vākyairbrahmatattvamavabodhayadbhiḥ śakyaḥ samucchettumiti kṛtamatra vidhinā /
GSP33brsvbh3u:799: nahi vidhiśatenāpi vinā tattvāvabodhanaṃ pravartasvātmajñāna iti vā kuru prapañcapravilayaṃ veti pravartitaḥ śaknoti prapañcapravilayaṃ kartum /
GSP33brsvbh3u:800: na cāsyātmajñānavidhiṃ vinā vedāntārthabrahmatattvāvabodho na bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh3u:801: maulikasya svādhyāyādhyayanavidhereva vivakṣitārthatayā sakalasya vedarāśeḥ phalavadarthāvabodhanaparatāmāpādayato vidyamānatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh3u:805: tasmāt 'jartilayavāgvā juhuyāt'itivadvidhisarūpā ete 'ātmā vā are draṣṭavya'ityādayo na tu vidhaya iti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:806: tadidamuktam-draṣṭavyādiśabdā api tattvābhimudhīkaraṇapradhānā na tattvāvabodhavidhipradhānā iti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:807: apica brahmatattvaṃ niṣprapañcamuktaṃ na tatra niyojyaḥ kaścitsaṃbhavati /
GSP33brsvbh3u:824: kiñcānyanniyoganiṣṭhatayaiva ca paryavasyatyāmnāye yadabhyupagataṃbhavadbhiḥ śāstraparyālocanayāniyojyabrahmātmatvaṃ jīvasyeti tadetacchāstrāvirodhādapramāṇakam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:825: athaitacchāstramaniyojyabrahmātmatvaṃ ca jīvasya pratipādayati jīvaṃ ca niyuktaṃ tato dvyarthaṃ ca viruddhārthaṃ ca syādityāha-atheti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:827: nahi tadvākyaṃ tasya niyojyatāmāhāpi tu laukikapramāṇasiddhāṃ niyojyatāmāśritya darśapūrṇamāsau vidhatte /
GSP33brsvbh3u:828: idaṃ tu niyojyatāmapanayati ca niyuṅkte ceti durghaṭamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:830: paurvāparyālocanayā vedāntānāṃ tattvaniṣṭhatā śrutā na śrutā niyoganiṣṭhatetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:832: niyoganiṣṭhatve vākyasya darśapaurṇāmāsakarmaṇa ivāpūrvāvāntaravyāpārādātmajñānakarmaṇo 'pyapūrvāvāntaravyāpārādeva svargādiphalavanmokṣasyānandarūpaphalasya siddhiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:840: prakṛtaitāvattvaṃ hi pratiṣedhati tato bravīti ca bhūyaḥ / BBs_3,2.22 /
GSP33brsvbh3u:842: dve eva brahmaṇo rūpe brahmaṇaḥ paramārthato 'rūpasyādhyāropite dve eva rūpe tābhyāṃ hi tadrūpyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:845: atra pṛthivyaptejāṃsi trīṇi bhūtāni brahmaṇo rūpaṃ mūrtaṃ mūrcchitāvayavamitaretarānupraviṣṭāvayavaṃ kaṭhinamiti yāvat /
GSP33brsvbh3u:851: tasyaitasya brahmarūpasya tejo 'bannasya caturviśeṣaṇasyaiṣa rasaḥ sāro ya eṣa savitā tapati /
GSP33brsvbh3u:856: tasyaitasyāmūrtasyaitasyāmṛtasyaitasya yata etasya tyasyaiṣa raso ya eṣa etasmin savitṛmaṇḍale puruṣaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:857: karaṇātmako hiraṇyagarbhaprāṇāhvayastyasya hyeṣa rasaḥ sāro nityaparokṣatā ca sāmyamityadhidaivatam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:858_1: mūrtasyaitasya martyasyaitasya sthitasyaitasya sata eṣa raso yaccakṣuḥ sato hyoṣa rasa iti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:859_1: yata etasya tyasyaiṣa raso yo 'yaṃ dakṣiṇekṣan puruṣastyasya hyeṣa rasaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:860: liṅgasya hi karaṇātmakasya hiraṇyagarbhasya dakṣiṇamakṣyadhiṣṭhānaṃ śruteradhigatam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:861: tadevaṃ brahmaṇa aupādhikayormūrtāmūrtayorādhyātmikādhidaivikayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvena vibhāgo vyākhyātaḥ sattyacchabdavācyayoḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:862: athedānīṃ tasya karaṇātmanaḥ puruṣasya liṅgasya rūpaṃ vaktavyam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:866: niravaśeṣaṃ savāsanaṃ satyarūpamuktvā yattatsatyasya satyamuktaṃ brahma tatsvarūpāvadhāraṇārthamidamārabhyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:867_0: yataḥ satyasya rūpaṃ niḥśeṣamuktamato 'vaśiṣṭaṃ satyasya yatsatyaṃ tasyānantaraṃ
GSP33brsvbh3u:867_1: taduktihetukaṃ svarūpaṃ vaktavyamityāha-athāta ādeśaḥkathanaṃ satyasatyasya paramātmanastamāha-neti netīti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:872: atraivamarthenetinā yatsaṃnihitaṃ parāmṛṣṭaṃ tanniṣidhyate nañā saṃnihitaṃ ca mūrtāmūrtaṃ savāsanaṃ rūpadvayam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:874: tatredaṃ vicāryate-kiṃ rūpadvayaṃ savāsanaṃ brahma ca sarvameva ca pratiṣidhyate,
GSP33brsvbh3u:875: uta brahmaivātha savāsanaṃ rūpadvayaṃ brahma tu pariśiṣyata iti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:876: yadyapi teṣu teṣu vedāntapradeśeṣu brahmasvarūpaṃ pratipāditaṃ tadasadbhāvajñānaṃ ca ninditam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:877: 'astītyevopalabdhavyaḥ'iti cāsya sattvamavadhāritaṃ tathāpi sadbodharūpaṃ tadbrahma savāsanamūrtāmūrtarūpasādhāraṇatayā ca sāmānyaṃ tasya caite viśeṣā mūrtāmūrtādayaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:882: ata eva nahyetasmāditi netyanyatparamastīti niṣedhāt paraṃ nāstīti sarvaniṣedhameva tattvamāha śrutiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:892: katarasyāstu niṣedha iti viśaye prapañcapratiṣedhe samastapratyakṣādivyākopaprasaṅgāt,
GSP33brsvbh3u:893: brahmapratiṣedhe tvavyākopādbrahmaiva pratiṣedhena saṃbadhyate yogyatvānna prapañcastadvaiparītyāt,
GSP33brsvbh3u:895: tatra prathamaṃ pakṣaṃ nirākaroti-na tāvadubhayapratiṣedha upapadyate śūnyavādaprasaṅgāditi /
GSP33brsvbh3u:896: ayamabhisaṃdhiḥ-upādhayo hyamī pṛthivyādayo 'vidyākalpitā na tu śoṇakarkādaya iva viśeṣā aśvatvasya /
GSP33brsvbh3u:904: tadidamuktam-apariśiṣyamāṇe cānyasminya itaraḥ pratiṣeddhumārabhyate tasya pratiṣedbhumaśakyatvāttasyaiva paramārthatvāpatteḥ pratiṣedhānupapattiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:910: tathāca yastasya śabdaḥ prāpakaḥ sa tatpara iti sa brahmaṇi pramāṇamiti kathamasya niṣedho 'pi pramāṇavān /
GSP33brsvbh3u:911: naca paryudāsādhikaraṇapūrvapakṣanyāyena vikalpaḥ vastuni siddhasvabhāve tadanupapatteḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:918: upakramaparāmarśopasaṃhāraparyālocanayā hi vedāntānāṃ sarveṣāmeva brahmaparatvamupapāditaṃ prathame 'dhyāye /
GSP33brsvbh3u:919: na cāsatyāmākāṅkṣāyāṃ dūratarasthena pratiṣedhenaiṣāṃ saṃbandhaḥ saṃbhavati /
GSP33brsvbh3u:920: yacca vāṅmanasātītatayā brahmaṇastatpratiṣedhasya na pramāṇāntaravirodha iti tatrāha-vāṅmanasātītatvamapīti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:925: tasmādvedāntavācā manasi saṃnidhānādbrahmaṇo vāṅmanasātītatvaṃ nāñjasamapi tu pratipādanaprakriyopakrama eṣaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:926: yathā gavādayo viṣayāḥ sākṣācchṛṅgagrāhikayā pratipādyante pratiyante ca naivaṃ brahma /
GSP33brsvbh3u:928: nanu prakṛtapratiṣedhe brahmaṇo 'pi kasmānna pratiṣedha ityata āha-taddhi prakṛtaṃ prapañcitaṃ ceti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:929: pradhānaṃ prakṛtaṃ prapañcaśca pradhānaṃ na brahma tasya ṣaṣṭhyantatayā prapañcāvacchedakatvenāpradhānatvādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:930: tato 'nyadbravītīti neti netīti pratiṣedhādanyadbhūyo bravītīti tannirvacanam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:931: nahyetasmādityasya yadā nahyetasmāditi neti netyādiṣṭādbrahmaṇo 'nyatparamastīti vyākhyānaṃ tadā prapañcapratiṣedhādanyadbrahmaiva bravītīti vyākhyeyam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:932: yadā tu nahyetasmāditi sarvanāmnā pratiṣedho brahmaṇa ādeśaḥ parāmṛśyate tadāpi prapañcapratiṣedhamātraṃ na pratipattavyamapi tu tena pratiṣedhena bhāvarūpaṃ brahmopalakṣyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:933: kasmādityata āha-tato bravīti ca bhūya iti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:935: atha brahmaṇo nāmadheyaṃ nāma satyasya satyamiti tadvyācaṣṭe śrutiḥ-'prāṇā vai satyam'iti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:937: tat khalu satyamitarāpekṣayā tasyāpi paraṃ satyaṃ brahma /
GSP33brsvbh3u:938: tadevaṃ yataḥ pratiṣedhasya parastādbravīti tasmānna prapañcapratiṣedhamātraṃ brahmāpi tu bhāvarūpamiti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:939: tadevaṃ pūrvasmin vyākhyāne nirvacanaṃ bravītīti vyākhyātam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:958: kuṇḍalādirūpeṇa tu bheda ityuktaṃ tena viṣayabhedādbhedābhedayoravirodha ityekaviṣayatvena vā sarvadopalabdheravirodhaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:959: viruddhamiti hi naḥ kva saṃpratyayo na yatpramāṇenopalabhyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:960: āgamataśca pramāṇādekagocarāvapi bhedābhedau pratīyamānau na virodhamāvahataḥ savitṛprakāśayoriva pratyakṣātpramāṇādbhedābhedāviti //27//
GSP33brsvbh3u:974: ahitvakuṇḍalatve bhinne iti vaktavyaṃ na tu vastunastābhyāṃ bhedābhedau /
GSP33brsvbh3u:977: atha vastuno na bhidyete ahitvakuṇḍalatve tathā sati ko bhedābhedayorviṣayabhedastayorvastuno 'nanyatvenābhedāt /
GSP33brsvbh3u:978: na caikaviṣayatve 'pi sadānubhūyamānatvādbhedābhedayoravirodhaḥ svarūpaviruddhayorapyavirodhe kva nāma virodho vyavatiṣṭheta /
GSP33brsvbh3u:981: prapañcitaṃ caitadasmābhiḥ prathamasūtra iti neha prapañcitam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:986: yathāha śrutiḥ-'tameva viditvātimṛtyumeti nānyaḥ panthā vidyate 'yanāya'iti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1000: tadyathā prācī pratīcī dakṣiṇodīcīti catasraḥ kalā avayavā iva kalāḥ sa prakāśavānnāma prathamaḥ pādaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1001: etadupāsanāyāṃ prakāśavān mukhyo bhavatīti prakāśavān pādaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1002: athāparāḥ pṛthivyantarikṣaṃ dyauḥ samudra iti catasraḥ kalā eṣa dvitīyaḥ pādo 'nantavānnāma /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1004: athāgniḥ sūryaścandramā vidyuditi catasraḥ kalāḥ sa jyotiṣmānnāma pādastṛtīyastadupāsanājjyotiṣmān bhavatīti jyotiṣmān pādaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1005: atha ghrāṇaścakṣuḥ śrotraṃ vāgiti catasraḥ kalāścaturthaḥ pāda āyatanavānnāma /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1006: ete ghrāṇādayo hi gandhādiviṣayā mana āyatanamāśritya bhogasādhanaṃ bhavantītyāyatanavānnāma pādaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1019: yathā hi tantavaḥ paṭaṃ vidhārayanti tadupādānatvādevaṃ brahmāpi jagadvidhārayati tadupapādakatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1028: manaso brahmapratīkasya samāropitabrahmabhāvasya vāgghrāṇaścakṣuḥ śrotramiti catvāraḥ pādāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1029: mano hi vaktavyaghrātavyadraṣṭavyaśrotavyān gocarān vāgādibhiḥ saṃcaratīti saṃcaraṇasādhāraṇatayā manasaḥ pādastadidamadhyātman /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1030: ākāśasya brahmapratīkasyāgnirvāyurādityo diśa iti catvāraḥ pādāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1031: te hi vyāpino nabhasa udara iva goḥ pādā vilagnā upalakṣyanta iti pādāstadidamadhidaivatam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1032: tadanena pādavaditi vaidikaṃ nidarśanaṃ vyākhyāya laukikaṃ cedaṃ nidarśanamityāha-athavā pādavaditi /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1041: bhāsante tadvigame tu gabhastimaṇḍalenaikībhavantyatastena saṃbadhyanta evamihāpīti //34//
GSP33brsvbh3u:1045: ekībhāvaḥ kasmādiha saṃbandhaḥ kathañcidvyākhyāyate na mukhya evetyetatsūtreṇa pariharati-
GSP33brsvbh3u:1048: svabhāvaścedanena saṃbandhatvena spṛṣṭastataḥ svābhāvikastādātmyānnātiricyata iti tarkapāda upapāditamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1049: tathā bhedo 'pi trividho vānyādṛśaḥ svābhāvika ityarthaḥ //35//
GSP33brsvbh3u:1057_0: brahmādvaitasiddhāvapi na sarvagatatvaṃ sarvavyāpitā sarvasya brahmaṇā svarūpeṇa
GSP33brsvbh3u:1057_2: ca svasādhanopanyāsena ca sarvagatatvamapyātmanaḥ siddhaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1058: advaite siddhe sarvo 'yamanirvacanīyaḥ prapañcāvabhāso brahmādhiṣṭhāna iti sarvasya brahmasaṃbandhādbrahma sarvagatamiti siddham //37//
GSP33brsvbh3u:1064: nityaśuddhabuddhamuktasvabhāvasya brahmaṇaḥ kuta īśvaratvaṃ kutaśca phalahetutvamapītyata āha-tasyaiva brahmaṇo vyāvahārikyāmiti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1073: atha karmaṇa eva phalaṃ kasmānna bhavatītyata āha-karmaṇastvanukṣaṇavināśinaḥpratyakṣavināśina iti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1078: nahi svarga ātmānaṃ labhatāmityadhikāriṇaḥ kāmayante kintu bhogyo 'smākaṃbhavatviti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1079: tena yādṛśamebhiḥ kāmyate tādṛśasya phalatvamiti bhogyameva satphalamiti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1082: apica svarganarakau tīvratame sukhaduḥkhe iti tadviṣayeṇānubhavena bhogāparanāmnāvaśyaṃ bhavitavyam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1083: tasmādanubhavayogye ananubhūyamāne śaśaśṛṅgavanna sta iti niścīyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1084: codayati-athocyeta mā bhūtkarmānantaraṃ phalotpādaḥ karmākāryādapūrvātphalamutpatsyata iti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1086: yadyadacetanaṃ tattatsarvaṃ cetanādhiṣṭhitaṃ pravartata iti pratyakṣāgamābhyāmavadhāritam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1098: nanu 'svargakāmo yajeta'ityādayaḥ śrutayaḥ phalaṃ prati na sādhanatayā yāgaṃ vidadhati /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1099_0: tathāhi-yadi yāgādaya eva kriyā na tadatiriktā bhāvanā tathāpi ta eva svapadebhyaḥ
GSP33brsvbh3u:1099_1: pūrvāparībhūtāḥ sādhyasvabhāvā avagamyanta iti na sādhyāntaramapekṣanta iti na svargeṇa
GSP33brsvbh3u:1100_0: athāpi tadatirekiṇī bhāvānāsti tathāpyasau bhāvyāpekṣāpi svapadopāttaṃ pūrvāvagataṃ
GSP33brsvbh3u:1100_1: na bhāvyaṃ dhātvarthamapahāya na bhinnapadopāttaṃ puruṣaviśeṣaṇaṃ ca svargādi bhāvyatayā svīkartumarhati /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1103: na kevalaṃ śabdato vastutaśca puruṣaprayatnasya bhāvanāyāḥ sākṣāddhātvartha eva sādhyo na tu svargādistasya tadavyāpyatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1104: svargādestu nāmapadābhidheyatayā siddharūpasyākhyātavācyaṃ sādhyaṃ dhātvarthaṃ prati 'bhūtaṃ bhavyāyopadiśyate'iti nyāyātsādhanatayā guṇatvenābhisaṃbandhaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1107_0: samīhitasya ca svargāderasādhyatvānna yāgādayaḥ puruṣasyopakurvantyanupakāriṇāṃ caiṣāṃ
GSP33brsvbh3u:1107_1: na puruṣa īṣṭe anīśānaśca na teṣu saṃbhavatyadhikārītyadhikārābhāvapratipāditānarthakyaparihārāya
GSP33brsvbh3u:1109: tatrādhikārasyoktena krameṇa nirākaraṇādasato 'pi pratīyamānasya vicārāsahasyopāyatāmātreṇāvasthānādanena vākyena dehātmabhāvapravilayastatpareṇa kriyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1111_0: niṣedhavākyāni ca sākṣādeva pravṛttiniṣedhena vidhivākyāni cānyāni 'sāṃgrahaṇyā yajeta
GSP33brsvbh3u:1112: yathā viṣaṃ bhuṅkṣava māsya gṛhe bhuṅkṣveti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1115: tanniṣedhena tu brahmaṇi praṇidhānamādadhacchāstraṃ śāstraṃ bhavet /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1118: kathaṃ tarhi vidhiḥ kimatra kathaṃ pravartanāmātratvādvidhestasya cādhikāramantareṇāpyupapatteḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1119: nahi yo yaḥ pravartayati sa sarvo 'dhikṛtamapekṣate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1120: pavanādeḥ pravartakasya tadanapekṣatvāditiśaṅkāmapācikīrṣurāha-tatra ca vidhiśruterviṣayabhāvopagamādyāgaḥ svargasyotpādaka iti gamyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1130: tathāca 'svargakāmo yajeta'ityādiṣu svargakāmādeḥ samīhitopāyā gamyante yāgādayaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1135: na caite sākṣādbhāvanābhāvyā api kartrapekṣitasādhanatāvidhyupahitamaryādā bhāvanoddeśyā bhavitumarhanti,
GSP33brsvbh3u:1145: phalasya sākṣādbhāvanāvyāpyatvavirahiṇo 'pi taduddeśyatayā sarvatra vyāpitayā vyavasthānātsvargasādhane yāgādau svargakāmāderadhikāra iti siddham /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1146: na cāprāptārthaviṣayāḥ sāṃgrahaṇyādiyāgavidhayaḥ parisaṃkhyāyakā niyāmakā vā bhavitumarhanti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1150: svarasataḥ pratīyamāner'the vākyasya tādarthye saṃbhavati na saṃpātāyātaparatvamucitam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1158: etaduktaṃ bhavati-karmaṇo hi phalaṃ prati yatsādhanatvaṃ śrutaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh3u:1160: naca vyāpāravati satyeva vyāpāro nāsatīti yuktam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1162: asatyapi ca tailapānakarmaṇi tena puṣṭau kartavyāyāmantarā tailapariṇāmabhedānāṃ tadavāntaravyāpāratvāt /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1163: tasmātkarmakāryamapūrvaṃ karmaṇā phale kartavye tadavāntaravyāpāra iti yuktam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1164: yadā punaḥ phalopajananānyathānupapattyā kiñcitkalpyate tadāphalasya vā pūrvāvasthā /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1172: nahi jātu mṛtpiṇḍadaṇḍādayaḥ kumbhakārādyanadhiṣṭhitāḥ kumbhādyārambhāya vibhavavanto dṛṣṭāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:1175: tasmādacetanaṃ karma vāpūrvaṃ vā na cetanānadhiṣṭhitaṃ svatantraṃ svakāryaṃ pravartitumutsahate naca caitanyamātraṃ karmasvarūpasāmānyaviniyogādiviśeṣavijñānaśūnyamupayujyate,
GSP33brsvbh3u:1177_1: cetanādhiṣṭhānādacetanānāṃ kāryārambhakatvamiti tathā caitanyaṃ devatāyā asati bādhake
GSP33brsvbh3u:1177_2: śrutismṛtītihāsapurāṇaprasiddhaṃ na śakyaṃ pratiṣedhdhumityapi spaṣṭaṃ niraṭaṅki devatādhikaraṇe /

GSP33brsvbh3u:3324: naca śaucasantoṣaśamadamādayastapaḥ pakṣe vartante tatra vṛddhānāṃ tapaḥprasiddherasiddheḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3328: traya eta iti kiṃ bhikṣurapi parāmṛśyate kintvā bhikṣuvarjaṃ traya eva /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3329: na tāvantraya iti bhikṣusaṃgrahe tadvarjanamete traya ityatra vartuṃ śakyam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3330: eta iti prakṛtānāṃ sākalyena parāmarśādbhikṣusaṃgrahe ca na tasya puṇyalokatvamabrahmasaṃsthātvābhāvādbhikṣoḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3331: tena tasya brahmasaṃsthasya sadā puṇyalokatvamamṛtatvaṃ ceti virodhaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3338: satyaṃ yaugikaḥ śabdaḥ sati prakṛtasaṃbhave na tadatipattyāprakṛte vartitumarhati /

GSP33brsvbh3u:3342: tatsaṃsthatā hi svābhāvaṃ vyavacchindantī virodhādyastatsaṃstha eva tatrāñjasī nānyatra /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3345: brahmasaṃsthatvamasādhāraṇaṃ parivrājakadharmaṃ śrutirādarśayatītyāha-tathāca nyāsa iti brahmeti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3346: sarvasaṅgaparityāgo hi nyāsaḥ sa brahmā kuta ityata āha-brahmā hi paraḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3348: kimapekṣya paraḥ saṃnyāsa ityata āha-tāni vā etānyavarāṇi tapāṃsi nyāsa evātyarecayaditi /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3350: tathā cedṛśaṃ nyāsalakṣaṇaṃ brahmasaṃsthatvaṃ bhikṣorevāsādhāraṇaṃ netareṣāmāśramiṇām /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3351: brahmajñānasya śabdajanitasya yaḥ paripākaḥ sākṣātkāro 'pavargasādhanaṃ tadaṅgatayā pārivrājyaṃ vihitam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3355: stutimātram upādānād iti cen nāpūrvatvāt / BBs_3,4.21 /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3356_1: sa eṣa rasānāṃ rasatama ityādinā padasaṃdarbheṇaikavākyabhāvamupagataḥ stūyate /

GSP33brsvbh3u:3377: sāmānyoktau tadviśeṣāḥ pacedityādayo 'pi gamyanta iti tatra kuryādityākṣiptakartṛkā bhāvanā /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3380: evaṃ daṇḍī bhaveddaṇḍinā bhavitavyaṃ daṇḍinā bhūyetetyekadhātvarthaviṣayā vidhyupahitā bhāvanā udāhāryāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3382: yathā kulālavyāpārādghaṭo bhavati bījādaṅkuro bhavatīti prayuñjate /

GSP33brsvbh3u:3392: yadyapi upaniṣadākhyānāni vidyāsaṃnidhau śrutāni tathāpi 'sarvāṇyākhyānāni pāriplave'iti sarvaśrutyā niḥśeṣārthatayā durbalasya saṃnidherbādhitatvātpāriplavārthānyevākhyānāni /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3393_0: naca sarvā dāśatayīranubrūyāditi viniyoge 'pi dāśatayīnāṃ prātisvikaviniyogāttatra
GSP33brsvbh3u:3393_1: tatra karmaṇi yathā viniyogo na virudhyate tathehāpi satyapi pāriplave viniyege saṃnidhānādvidyāṅgatvamapi
GSP33brsvbh3u:3394: dāśatayīṣu prātisvikānāṃ viniyogānāṃ samudāyaviniyogasya ca tulyabalatvādiha tu saṃnidhānāt śruterbalīyastvāt /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3396: kintu pāriplavamācakṣītetyupakramya yānyāmnātāni manurvaivasvato rājetyādīni teṣāmeva tatra viniyogaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh3u:3401: yathā sarve brāhmaṇā bhojayitavyā ityatra nimantritāpekṣaḥ sarvaśabdaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3402: tathā copaniṣadākhyānānāṃ vidyāsaṃnidhirapratidvandīṃ vidyaikavākyatāṃ so 'rodīdityādīnāmiva vidyekavākyatvaṃ gamayatīti siddham /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3403: pratipattisaukaryāccetyupākhyānena hi bālā apyavadhīyante yathā tantropākhyāyikayeti //23//
GSP33brsvbh3u:3411: vidyāyāḥ kratvarthatve sati tathā kratūpakaraṇāya svakāryāya kraturapekṣitaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3413: yadā tu puruṣārthā tadā nānayā kraturapekṣitaḥ svakārye nirapekṣāyā eva tasyāḥ sāmarthyāt /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3414: agnīndhānādinā cāśramakarmāṇyupalakṣyante tadāha-agnīndhanādīnyāśramakarmāṇi vidyayā svārthasiddhau nāpekṣitavyānīti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3422: yathā svārthasiddhau nāpekṣyante āśramakarmāṇi evamutpattāvapi nāpekṣyeranniti śaṅkā syāt /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3432: caturthī sākṣātkāravatī vṛttirūpā nāntarīyakaṃ hi tasyāḥ kaivalyamiti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3433: tatrādye tāvatpratipatti viditapadatadarthasya viditavākyagatigocaranyāyasya ca puṃsa upapadyete eveti na tatra karmāpekṣā /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3434: te eva ca cintāmayīṃ tṛtīyāṃ pratipattiṃ prasuvāte iti na tatrāpi karmāpekṣā /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3435: sā cādaranairantaryadīrghakālasevitā sākṣātkāravatīmādhatta eva pratipattiṃ caturthīmiti na tatrāpyasti karmāpekṣā /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3436: tannāntarīyakaṃ ca kaivalyamiti na tasyāpi karmāpekṣā /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3437: tadevaṃ pramāṇataśca prameyata utpattau ca kārye ca na jñānasya karmāpekṣeti bījaṃ śaṅkāyām /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3438: evaṃ prāpta ucyate-utpattau jñānasya karmāpekṣā vidyate vividiṣotpādadvārā 'vividiṣanti yajñena'iti śruteḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3440: yathā yasya parṇamayī juhūrbhavatīti parṇamayatāvidhirapūrvatvānna tvayaṃ vartamānāpadeśaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh3u:3446: sa hi tattvato 'nityāśuciduḥkhānātmani saṃsāre sati nityaśucimukhātmalakṣaṇena vibhrameṇa malinayati cittasattvamadharmanibandhanatvādvibhramāṇām /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3447: ataḥ pāpmanaḥ prakṣaye pratyakṣopapattidvārāpāvaraṇe sati pratyakṣopapattibhyāṃ saṃsārasya tāttvikīmanityāśuciduḥkharūpatāmapratyūhaṃ viniścineti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3450: tato hānopāyaṃ paryeṣate paryeṣamāṇaścātmatattvajñānamasyopāya iti śāstrādācāryavacanāccopaśrutya tajjijñāsata iti vividiṣopahāramukhenātmajñānotpattāvasti karmāṇāmupayogaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3451: vividiṣuḥ khalu yukta ekāgratayā śravaṇamanane kartumutsahate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3454: yena bhāvanāyāṃ vā bhāvanākārye vā sākṣātkāre karmaṇāmupayogaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3458: dṛṣṭārtheṣu tu karmasu pratiṣiddhavarjanamanadhikāre 'pyasaktasya svārasikī pravṛttirupapadyata eva /

GSP33brsvbh3u:3462: upapāditaṃ caitadasmābhiḥ prathamasūtra ite neha punaḥ pratyāpyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3463: tasmādvividiṣotpādadvārāśramakarmaṇāṃ vidyotpattāvupayogo na vidyākārya iti siddham /

GSP33brsvbh3u:3474: yadidaṃ loke 'nnamā ca śvabhya ā ca śakunibhyaḥ sarvaprāṇināṃ yadannaṃ tattavānnamiti /

GSP33brsvbh3u:3541: catasṛṇāmapi ca pratipattīnāṃ brahmaṇi vidhānānupapatterityuktaṃ prathamasūtre /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3542: draṣṭavyo nididhyāsitavya iti ca vidhisarūpaṃ na vidhirityapyuktam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3545: naca svaṃ rūpaṃ brahmaṇaḥ sādhyaṃ nityatvāt /

GSP33brsvbh3u:3557: kintu ajñātajñāpanasvaraso vidhiḥ prakaraṇaikye sphuṭatarapratyabhijñābalena svarasaṃ jahyāt /

GSP33brsvbh3u:3563: kāle hi karma vidhīyate na karmaṇi kāla ityutsargaḥ /

GSP33brsvbh3u:3584: nanu yathādhītaveda eva dharmajijñāsāyāmadhikriyate nānadhītaveda iha janmani /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3585: tatheha janmanyāśramakarmotpāditavividiṣa eva vidyāyāmadhikṛto netara ityanāśramiṇāmanadhikāro vidhuraprabhṛtīnāmityata āha-dṛṣṭārthā ceti /

GSP33brsvbh3u:3607: tadbhūtasya tu nātadbhāvo jaiminer api niyamāt tadrūpābhāvebhyaḥ / BBs_3,4.40 /

GSP33brsvbh3u:3624: upapūrvam api tv eke bhāvamaśanavat tad uktam / BBs_3,4.42 /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3627: tasyāmapi ca sākṣātprāyaścittaṃ na kartavyamiti prāyaścittaniṣedho na gamyate,

GSP33brsvbh3u:3633: sūtrārthastu-upapūrvamapi pātakaṃ naiṣṭhikasyāvakīrṇitvaṃ na mahāpātakamapirevakārārthe ata eke prāyaścittabhāvamicchantīti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3635: śāstrasthā yā vā prasiddhiḥ sā grāhyā śāstramūlatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3640: bahis tūbhayathāpi smṛter ācārāc ca / BBs_3,4.43 /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3641: yadi naiṣṭhikādīnāmasti prāyaścittaṃ tatkimetaiḥ kṛtanirṇejanaiḥ saṃvyavahartavyamuta neti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3642: tatra doṣakṛtatvādasaṃvyavahārasya prāyaścittena tannibarhaṇādanibarhaṇo vā tatkaraṇavaiyarthyātsaṃvyavahāryā eveti prāpta ucyate-bahistūbhayathāpi smṛterācārācca /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3643: niṣiddhakarmānuṣṭhānajanyameno lokadvaye 'pyaśuddhimāpādayati dvaidham kasyacidenaso lokadvaye 'pyaśuddhirapanīyate prāyaścittairenonibarhaṇaṃ kurvāṇaiḥ /

GSP33brsvbh3u:3673: bālyena tiṣṭhāsedityatra ca sā śrūyate na śrūyate tu maune /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3676: tasmādbrāhṇaḥ pāṇḍityaṃ nirvidyeti pāṇḍityavidhānādeva maunasiddheḥ pāṇḍityameva maunamiti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3677: athavā bhikṣuvacano 'yaṃ muniśabdastatra darśanāt 'gārhasthyamācāryakulaṃ maunaṃ vānaprastham'ityatra /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3679: tasmādbālyamevātra vidhīyate maunaṃ tu prāptaṃ praśaṃsārthamanūdyata iti yuktam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3681: api tu jñānamātraṃ pāṇḍityaṃ jñānātiśayasaṃpattistu maunaṃ tatraiva tatprasiddheḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3683: tasmādapūrvatvānmaunasya bālyapāṇḍityāpekṣayā tṛtīyamidaṃ maunaṃ jñānātiśayarūpaṃ vidhīyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3684: evaṃ ca nirvedanīyatvamapi vidhāna āñjasaṃ syādityāha-nirvedanīyatvanirdeśāditi /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3685: kasyedaṃ maunaṃ vidhīyate vidyāsahakāritayetyata āha-tadvato vidyāvataḥ saṃnyāsinobhikṣoḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3693: api tu vidyodayāyābhyāso pravṛtto na punarutpannavidyātiśayaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3696: ata eva samidādirvidhyantaḥ sa hi vidhiḥ pradhānavidheḥ paścāditi /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3700: nanu yadyayamāśramo bālyapradhānaḥ kasmātpunargārhasthyenopasaṃharatīti codayati-evaṃ bālyādiviśiṣṭeti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3703: chāndogye bahulāyāsasādhyakarmabahulatvādgārhasthyasya cāśramāntaradharmāṇāṃ ca keṣāñcidahiṃsādīnāṃ samavāyāttenopasaṃhāro na punastena samāpanādityarthaḥ //48//
GSP33brsvbh3u:3706: evaṃ tadāśramadvayopanyāsena kvacitkadāciditarābhāvaśaṅkā mandabuddheḥ syāditi tadapākaraṇārthaṃ sūtram-
GSP33brsvbh3u:3708: vṛttirvānaprasthānāmanekavidhairevaṃ brahmācāriṇo 'pīti vṛttibhedo 'nuṣṭhātāro vā puruṣā bhidyante,
GSP33brsvbh3u:3714: evaṃ ca śāstrāntarābādhenāpyupapattau na śāstrāntarabādhanamanyāyyaṃ bhaviṣyatīti //50//
GSP33brsvbh3u:3719: kiṃ śravaṇādibhirihaiva vā janmani vidyā sādhyate utāniyama iha vāmutra veti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3720: yadyapi karmāṇi yajñādīnyaniyataphalāni teṣāṃ ca vidyotpādasādhanatvena vidyotpādasyāniyamaḥ pratibhāti /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3721: tathāca garbhasthasya vāmadevasyātmapratibodhaśravaṇāt 'anekajanmasaṃsiddhastato yāti parāṃ gatim'iti ca smaraṇādāmuṣmikatvamapyavagamyate /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3725: naca pramāṇeṣu pravartamānāḥ pramātāra aihikamapi cirabhāvinaṃ pramotpādaṃ kāmayante kintu tādātvikameva prāgeva tu pāralaukikam /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3726: nahi kumbhalādidṛkṣuścakṣuṣī samunmīlayati kālāntarīyāya kumbhadarśanāya kintu tādātvikāya /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3728: śrutismṛtī ca pāralaukikaṃ vidyotpādaṃ stutyā brūtaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3730_0: evaṃ prāpta ucyate-yata evātra vidyotpāde śravaṇādibhiḥ kartavye yajñādīnāṃ sattvaśuddhidvāreṇa
GSP33brsvbh3u:3730_1: vā vighnopaśamadvārā vopayogo 'ta eva teṣāṃ yajñādīnāṃ karmāntarapratibandhāpratibandhābhyāmaniyataphalatvena
GSP33brsvbh3u:3731: tathāca teṣāṃ yajñādyapekṣāṇāṃ teṣāṃ cāniyataphalatvena śravaṇādīnāmapyaniyataphalatvaṃ yuktamevaṃ śrutismṛtipratibandho na stutimātratvena vyākhyeyo bhaviṣyati /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3732: puruṣāśca vidyārthinaḥ sādhanasāmarthyānusāreṇa tadanurūpameva kāmayiṣyante tadidamuktam-abhisaṃdherniraṅkuśatvāditi //51//
GSP33brsvbh3u:3737: tathā ca yathā sādhanotkarṣanikarṣābhyāṃ tatphalasya vidyāyā utkarṣanikarṣāvevaṃ vidyāphalasyāpi mukterutkarṣanikarṣau saṃbhāvyete /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3738: naca muktāvaihikāmuṣmikatvalakṣaṇo viśeṣa upapadyate brahmopāsanāparipākalabdhajanmani vidyāyāṃ jīvato mukteravaśyaṃbhāvaniyamātsatyapyārabdhavipākakarmāprakṣaye /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3740_1: mukterapi vidyāphalatvādrūpataścotkarṣanikarṣau syātāmiti prāpata ucyate-na muktestatra
GSP33brsvbh3u:3742: naca muktirbrahmaṇo nityasvarūpāvasthānalakṣaṇā nityā satī sādhyā bhavitumarhati /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3743: naca savāsananiḥśeṣakleśakarmāśayaprakṣayo vidyājanma {FN 1-virodhikāryodaya eva pūrvapradhvasaṃ iti matamāśritya kleśādikṣayo vidyājanmeti sāmānādhikaraṇyam /}
GSP33brsvbh3u:3746: naca cirācirotpādānutpādāvantareṇa vidyāyāmapi rūpato bhedaḥ kaścidupalakṣyate tasyā apyekarūpatvena śruteḥ /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3748: na cātra vidyātvaṃ sāmānyato dṛṣṭaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh3u:3750: tasmāttasyā muktyavasthāyā aikarūpyāvadhṛtermuktilakṣaṇasya phalasyāviśeṣo yukta iti //52//
GSP33brsvbh3u:3751: iti śrīvācaspatimiśraviracite śārīrakabhagavatpādabhāṣyavibhāge bhāmatyāṃ tṛtīyādhyāyasya caturthaḥ pādaḥ //
